Articles.Content:
Are there any good mods that can allow making a Titan from BF2142 without lag? I tried it with the B9 and other mods but its not stable and wobbles around and it very VERY laggy. Here are some pictures of the Titan:

http://bf4central.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/battlefield-4-titan-rumor.jpg

http://guidesmedia.ign.com/guides/819222/images/image066.jpg

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/9/9e/BF2142_Titan_with_explanation.jpg

So are there any possibiliies?
